name: vidcutter
description: UPDATE: New AppImage to fix crashes on Ubuntu 17.01 and above... v5.0.5 released mainly for AppImage users and those of you having problems with the previous release. Check RELEASES page for Windows, macOS and Linux AppImage releases or the usual Launchpad PPA + Fedora RPMFusion/UnitedRPMS/COPR + openSUSE Tumbleweed/Packman/OBS repos...
